description:
In this guide, discover multiple solutions to fix the unexpected error message on the Gnome Extensions site while installing a new extension.

The post [Fixed] An Unexpected Error Occurred on Gnome Extensions appeared first on Linux Today.
title: [Fixed] An Unexpected Error Occurred on Gnome Extensions

description:
Learn a step-by-step guide to install Perl modules on Ubuntu, list Perl modules on Ubuntu, and uninstall Perl modules from Ubuntu.

The post How to Install Perl Modules on Ubuntu 24.04: A Step-By-Step Guide appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install Perl Modules on Ubuntu 24.04: A Step-By-Step Guide

description:
Looking to extract more performance out of your Pi? Check out our top picks for the best lightweight OS available on the Raspberry Pi today.

The post 7 of the Best Lightweight Operating Systems for Raspberry Pi appeared first on Linux Today.
title: 7 of the Best Lightweight Operating Systems for Raspberry Pi

description:
Firefox 131 looks like another small update to the popular web browser that further improves the built-in translation feature by remembering languages you have previously used for translations when suggesting a default translation language.

The post Firefox 131 Beta Improves Translations, Adds Temporary Site Permissions appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Firefox 131 Beta Improves Translations, Adds Temporary Site Permissions

description:
This Linux-powered handheld gaming console is great for gamers and is a gateway to Linux desktop users.

The post Valve Steam Deck as a Stepping Stone to the Linux Desktop appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Valve Steam Deck as a Stepping Stone to the Linux Desktop

description:
Samba 4.21, a free software reimplementation of the SMB protocol, rolls out with enhancements in LDAP TLS, user validation, and more.

The post Samba 4.21 Launches With Enhanced Security Features appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Samba 4.21 Launches With Enhanced Security Features

description:
Germany’s STF funds FreeBSD with €686,400 to advance zero trust builds & SBOM tooling for enhanced security.

The post Germany’s Sovereign Tech Fund Injects €686,400 Into FreeBSD appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Germany’s Sovereign Tech Fund Injects €686,400 Into FreeBSD

description:
Firefox 130 is now available for download, featuring new translation tools, better scrolling animations, and improved Android performance.

The post Firefox 130 Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Firefox 130 Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New

description:
Discover two favorite sysadmin commands, known as acct and psacct, that allow them to track the activity of users on the system.

The post Monitor Linux User Activity With Acct or Psacct Tools appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Monitor Linux User Activity With Acct or Psacct Tools

description:
ONLYOFFICE Docs or Document Server is an online office suite that can be installed on your local server. This guide shows you how to deploy the ONLYOFFICE Document Server on an Ubuntu 24.04 server, with PostgreSQL as the database and Nginx as a reverse proxy. You’ll also secure the ONLYOFFICE Docs with HTTPS through Certbot […]

The post How to Install ONLYOFFICE Docs on Ubuntu 24.04 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install ONLYOFFICE Docs on Ubuntu 24.04
